Package codes.ollieg.magicmotd.handlers

Class PingHandler

java.lang.Object
codes.ollieg.magicmotd.handlers.PingHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.md_5.bungee.api.plugin.Listener
public class PingHandler extends Object implements net.md_5.bungee.api.plugin.Listener
Listens for the ProxyPingEvent and handles it.
Rewrites the MOTD.
